name: Image Search - PictPicks
description: Application name is changed to PictPicks from Image Search Viewer.  PictPicks is free application to search images and photos with a simple operation. It is comfortable to use because applied Material Design well.  When searching images, you can use following functions.  Search images - Search related images by image selected from your device - Use query from your history - Filter settings (size, color, type, time) - SafeSearch  And you can use image as following operation.  Use images - View image (zoom) - Search related image - Save image - Share image - Use image in wallpaper and contact photo  This app uses Google as search engine.
